Text: Also, the AccessAllAreas profile modifier should be in affect.
Contains a trojan. Do not download.

I've scanned with Norton, AVG, Zonealarm, and others, It's completely clean and is a fully functioning game.

though if you don't want to take any risks, that's okay.

This seems to be the Full game (not that I've played it before).  

AVG didn't moan about any virii or trojans.

Not a clue how to play it though - a manual would have been nice ;) (Ah well, what can I expect from free soft!! ? :-) )

The size is because it's the installed game, not the installer.

It's version 1.0 so really old, with occasional crashes.
